# cook your code here
t=int(raw_input())
for z in range(t):
    n=int(raw_input())
    cl=map(int,raw_input().split())
    ck=map(int,raw_input().split())
    for i in set(cl) & set(ck):
        cl.remove(i)
        ck.remove(i)
    cl.sort()
    ck.sort()
    s=0
    for i in range(len(cl)):
        s+=abs(cl[i]-ck[i])
    print "Case "+str(z+1)+": "+str(s)
